description:
Amy is a beginning trainer who Ash and his friends met in a forest while in a dire battle with her raging Crimgan. Amy arrived on the scene to try to calm it down but it took off into the forest. With Iris help, Amy and her Crimgan were reunited as Iris managed to take off the wire that was wrapped around its leg. Amy traded with her father to get Crimgan and it became the first Dragon type Pok√©mon she would raise.
In a practice battle against Ash`s Tepig, Iris helped Amy learn some of the basic battling techniques and her Crimgan was able to defeat Ash`s Tepig in the battle.
After an encounter with Team Rocket, her Crimgan was recovered and she thanked Iris and Ash for their help and they parted ways. She was now more confident with her Crimgan and decided to begin a journey together with it.
name: Amy
